Key Arguments: The public should be able to discuss and comment on all subjects freely.
Hearing dissenting views is essential for ascertaining the truth.
The legislation mimics oppressive regimes like China, North Korea, Russia, and Nazi Germany.
The public can generally discern truth from misinformation when exposed to both sides of an argument.
The proposed law undermines democratic principles and could lead to a totalitarian society.
Notable Quotes: To have legislation such as this Bill only mimics what the governments of China and North Korea are doing.
The proposed law will undermine this principle and move Australia to a Totalitarianism society.
